channel.title: Help would be very much appreciated
channel.description: Ok so i use the abstractpk source but i will udpate the server and people get roll backs and stuff how do i fifx this please help me (:

item.title: Help would be very much appreciated
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:8, topic:431469”][quote author=xI c E link=topic=534147.msg3905077#msg3905077 date=1328146858]
You could make & use a command that loops through all online players that saves them before you close the console.
[/quote]that would cause a shit of lagging with a lot of players online. Why do you think mass saving helps the server efficiency?[/quote]

the lag would be over 9000 m/s bro. just give them like 3 min, and tell them to log off. its that easy.

Read full topic
item.source: Help would be very much appreciated

item.title: Help would be very much appreciated
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

beavercalk:

Ok so i use the abstractpk source but i will udpate the server and people get roll backs and stuff how do i fifx this please help me (:

um, that happens on almost every server. when you are about to update, tell them all to log off, so it dosnt disconnect them.

Read full topic

item.title: Help would be very much appreciated
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Don’t shut down the server when they are online… and wait for the player save data to complete.

Read full topic
